title: Command Injection
description: The code constructs a command string by concatenating user input (args) with a path (csPath). This can lead to command injection if the args variable contains malicious input.
fix: Use parameterized commands or properly sanitize and validate user inputs before constructing system commands.

reasoning.pattern: Concatenation of user input with a command string without validation.
reasoning.exploit_example: An attacker can inject malicious commands by providing specially crafted input for the args variable, such as '; rm -rf /;'.
